title: Breakingviews TV: Yield curved
text:
Breakingviews TV: Yield curved 1:25pm EDT - 03:18 
Tom Buerkle talks to Richard Beales about the possibility of a U.S. Treasury yield-curve inversion and explains why it shouldn’t be interpreted as a warning that a recession is right around the corner.   
Tom Buerkle talks to Richard Beales about the possibility of a U.S. Treasury yield-curve inversion and explains why it shouldn’t be interpreted as a warning that a recession is right around the corner.  //reut.rs/2KaZBqL
